name: 4UeBqE7qAWBu2CDPVjWa9W
postBody:
Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP second-generation file systems are now available in 2 additional AWS Regions: US West (N. California), and Europe (Frankfurt).
Amazon FSx makes it easier and more cost effective to launch, run, and scale feature-rich high-performance file systems in the cloud. Second-generation FSx for ONTAP file systems give you more performance scalability and flexibility over first-generation file systems by allowing you to create or expand file systems with up to 12 highly-available (HA) pairs of file servers, providing your workloads with up to 72 GBps of throughput and 1 PiB of provisioned SSD storage.
With this regional expansion, second-generation FSx for ONTAP file systems are available in the following AWS Regions: US East (N. Virginia, Ohio), US West (N. California, Oregon), Europe (Frankfurt, Ireland), and Asia-Pacific (Sydney). You can create second-generation Multi-AZ file systems with a single HA pair, and Single-AZ file systems with up to 12 HA pairs. To learn more, visit the FSx for ONTAP user guide.
headline: Second-generation Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP now available in 2 additional Regions
